name: A Midnight Village Story
description:
Welcome to Midnight Village, an island where the night rules the skies, yet the folk live simple, cozy lives... but in a village where night rules the skies, are there any secrets to be discovered?

You walk the shoes of Kurosuke, newly moved in to Midnight Village.
Talk to the villagers of Midnight Village throughout the twelve days of midnight.
Learn the secrets of the villagers and befriend them throughout your journey.
Explore the island of the Midnight Village with it's lush forest.

What will you uncover? Perhaps stories of spies? Ghosts and demons? Or curses, even murder!?

Whatever you find out, whatever happens, it's all a part of this story about the Midnight Village.
